LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Promotions.Gifts.Requirements.Description
LocaleResource.Value:
Set up requirements to a created gift if you want to limit it to certain user categories depending on a customer role, the amount spent, etc.You can use single requirement type, or group several types and apply them simultaneously.
Requirement group is a useful feature for creating gift requirement templates.You can create a requirement group just once and then use it every time you want this limitation to be applied.You can include one requirement group into another one if needed.
